sqlMap.select: SELECT d.model_name, c.UNIT_NAME, a.TAR_CODE, b.TAR_NAME, a.TAR_VALUE FROM pfm_tm_qty_org a JOIN pfm_tm_qty_def b ON a.TAR_CODE = b.TAR_CODE join sys_unit c on c.UNIT_ID = a.ORG_ID join pfm_tm_model_def d on d.tar_code = a.tar_code where a.ORG_ID in (select unit_id From sys_unitmap a where a.RELA_UNITID= #modelAnalysisReport.unitId#' union select RELA_UNITID as UNIT_ID From sys_unitmap a where a.UNIT_ID= #modelAnalysisReport.unitId#) and a.STORE_DATE = #modelAnalysisReport.dataDate# and d.model_code =#modelAnalysis.modelCode#
